author: pbs.org
title: Indian Summers: Ralph Whelan Masterpiece
text: Discover the complex, ambitious, and conflicted Ralph Whelan, played by Henry Lloyd-Hughes. Indian Summers airs Sundays, September 27 - November 22, 2015 at 9/8c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #IndianSummersPBS
